description: Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID
Maps source value to STAND_STRUCTURE using lists of values

Counts number of layers based on the presence of a not null value for attributes representing each layer. Assumes valid LYR1 row must have ospcomp, LYR2 must have uspcomp, NFL1 must have polytype. Only 1 NFL layer possible per polygon. ospcomp can be null when uspcomp has a value.
